title: How Quantum Computing Startups Are Winning the Marketing Game
excerpt: As quantum computing matures from laboratory curiosity to commercial reality, startups in this space face a unique challenge: how do you market something most people don't understand? We explore the strategies that are working, the mistakes to avoid, and how to position quantum innovation for a mainstream audience.

title: National Institute for Materials Science: Advancing the Future
excerpt: Material science is the study of materials and their properties. It is a multidisciplinary field that combines physics, chemistry, and engineering to understand how materials behave and how they can be used in various applications. Material scientists work on developing new materials with specific properties for use in industries such as aerospace, electronics, and healthcare.
